meanings.definition: A phrase or statement written in memory of a person who has died.
meanings.sent1: The epitaphs on the gravestones told stories of the deceased.
meanings.sent2: Visitors to the cemetery read the epitaphs to learn about those who passed away.
meanings.sent3: The witty epitaphs on the tombstones made people smile despite the sadness.
meanings.sent4: The epitaphs etched in stone served as timeless reminders of the lives lost.
meanings.sent5: The haunting beauty of the epitaphs lingered in the minds of all who visited.

meanings.definition: Inscriptions on a tombstone or monument.
meanings.sent1: The epitaphs on the ancient tombstones were barely legible.
meanings.sent2: Tourists admired the intricate epitaphs carved into the marble monuments.
meanings.sent3: The epitaphs on the statues seemed to whisper secrets to those who passed by.
meanings.sent4: The epitaphs on the monuments stood as silent tributes to the long-gone souls.
meanings.sent5: The weather-worn epitaphs on the tombstones added a sense of history to the graveyard.
